headline: Vision Group Releases AIDC UPS Lithium Battery Safety White Paper
summary: As artificial intelligence continues to develop rapidly, AI Computing Center (AIDC) have become the foundation of next-generation computing. At the same time, their power demand and reliability requirements are increasing sharply. As a crucial part of power protection for AIDC, UPS lithium batteries face increasing safety challenges.

content.title: Vision Group Releases AIDC UPS Lithium Battery Safety White Paper
content.summary: As artificial intelligence continues to develop rapidly, AI Computing Center (AIDC) have become the foundation of next-generation computing. At the same time, their power demand and reliability requirements are increasing sharply. As a crucial part of power protection for AIDC, UPS lithium batteries face increasing safety challenges.

thumbnail.caption: AIDC UPS lithium battery safety insights for high-density computing scenarios

headline: UPS Resets Priorities With Cost Cuts And Healthcare Logistics Push
summary: UPS (NYSE:UPS) has announced a major overhaul of its operations, including up to 30,000 job cuts and the closure of two dozen facilities. The company plans to reduce its Amazon delivery volume as it shifts focus toward higher margin business. UPS is expanding in healthcare logistics through acquisitions of Frigo-Trans and Andlauer Healthcare Group to grow its global cold chain capabilities. United Parcel Service, trading at $105.99, is undertaking a large restructuring while its longer term...
